column5: 14th Annual Canadian Ice Fishing Championship Lake Simcoe, February 23rd and 24th, 2008 This years tournament is fast approching and with the cold temps forecasted for the next while we are looking good to go!! For all the details and to register your two person team today, visit http://www.cifc.org Be sure to check out Rocky Madsen's ice conditions report for Lake Simcoe, featured on the Canadian Ice Fishing Championship web site.
